website_summaries.verdict: Quite expensive, but the best smartphone on the market unless you dislike Apple iOS.
pros: Waterproof and fast with a great camera and good battery life
iOS is easy to use and Apple Store contains all the apps you'll ever need
Music through iTunes is a bonus and Apple finally added stereo speakers
cons: iTunes software package for Windows is buggy
Users rely on Apple for all apps, proprietary charger, and computer interface

customer_reviews.title: Item defective.
customer_reviews.text: Touch Screen Stopped working after a month, and did not get a refund or an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn’t work on black iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: The mic on this phone (iPhone 7 plus black) didn’t work. What a hassle. Of course you won’t find this out until you put service in it and try to make calls. If no one can hear you, what’s the point of the phone? Which means I had to take service off of my old phone, put the service on this phone. Take it off of this phone, because it’s not working, out it on another phone that works, spend hours in the Apple store just to have them tell me that the problem can’t be fixed. The whole phone has to be replaced. All this before going out of the country on a trip. Yeah... it’s sucks. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone on a whim when my other phone had broken. Many people say not to buy refurbished electronics, but I am very happy with my purchase. This phone is close to immaculate! the only signs of use are near the charging port where there is a little bit of scuffing. Another plus of my purchase was that the phone came with a pre-installed tempered glass screen protector, as well as a charging cord, and the charging block itself. The jet black color is in amazing condition for this phone being refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: adam3178

customer_reviews.title: "Works and looks like new" is a lie.
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone and it has 3 very noticeable scratches on the screen. I called customer service and all they wanted to do is ignore the fact that the description says "works and looks like new" and instead repeatedly refer to this statement 5 pages down in the description; no visible cosmetic imperfections when held 12 inches away. Unfortunately, they do not seem to care that I can easily see all the scratch in this screen from arms length or more with the screen lit up or dark. This phone was supplied by BuySPRY.
customer_reviews.author: Tomh

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTICCCCC THANK YOU
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Battery life is amazing, battery health overall is at 95% ❤️ No scuffs, no cracks, touch ID works! Im so happy. I wish it could have came with an adapter but oh well all is well. An adapter is only like $10 and you could get some bluetooth headphones. I would upload pics of the phone but I no longer have my old phone. Just know, this phone is perfect so far. I will try to come back and update this review next month or so if I remember! But this phone is awesome
customer_reviews.author: ShyTiana

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the best refurbished ever.
customer_reviews.text: 3D touch doesn’t work, the screen feels and look not like an original Apple iphone 7 Plus screen, feels roughly and fingers go not smooth at all. Strange feeling when you use it , I put a glass screen protector and it works better, but is not how it needs to be, and 3D touch still NO WORKING!!! 😒👎
customer_reviews.author: aLONZOmTONG

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING 6 MONTHS AFTER PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone on January 18 and it stopped working on me last Wednesday... I payed 400$ after taxes and shipping and it did not even last me a whole 6 months.... Did not drop it at all, had an otter box on it at all times, screen protector on, and the phone looks MINT condition. Went to apple to find out it has a hardware malfunction and that they could not fix it. It would not even let them restore/update the phone and I now have to buy a new one. Never again am I buying a refurbished iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Lutrzykowski

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy inexpensive upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to upgrade. Had tried 2 other 8 Plus phones from another company but both had problems. Wanted to upgrade to IOS 13. Maybe the phone—maybe the company? This 7 Plus is a great buy and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A McCrary

customer_reviews.title: Apple's design team should be proud of their work on the 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: I love how this phone feels when I hold it - smooth, solid, and dense. The screen is great. The cameras are awesome. It does everything I want it to do. It's wonderful seeing that, what used to fill my old phone's 32 GB, now occupies only a minuscule portion of the available storage. It only has two negatives: - The sleep button is on the side, so, when I turn it off, I also change the ringer volume.. - Since it's so smooth, I worry about losing grip and dropping it when I pull it from my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Like new.
customer_reviews.text: It was refurbished but you wouldn't know it. It also came with a screen protector already on that which is awesome. The battery life is amazing it is like new.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, knowing that the Jet Black basically gets scratched if you look at it too hard. Was expecting some scratches, but surprisingly, the phone was very clean, like new condition. There were some micro abrasions near the bottom edge, but it is in very good condition, from BuySPRY Phone is unlocked, I wanted Verizon service, so I ordered a Verizon sim card from TracFone and moved my existing account. So I can confirm that it works fine on TracFone using Verizon towers.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Wintermute

customer_reviews.title: really good phone
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone a week now and really like it, set up was easy, size is great, touch screen is awesome and works great! The only issue I had was with the FIND MY APP (specifically the people Tab) due to the phone being manufactured in Korea they are not allowed to track people, Apple support verified that function is not available on this phone. That was a deal breaker as I have family members with medical conditions that need to be located, I had to return the phone.
customer_reviews.author: CmStJ

customer_reviews.title: As offered - appears like new
customer_reviews.text: I needed an reasonably current iPhone to replace an aging iPod and an old pay as you go T-Mobile phone. The price was good and the phone looks like new. T-Mobile cloned my old sim card to a small sim. I put the mini-sim into the phone and it worked immediately. I was able to back up my old iPod using iTunes and was able to restore it to the iPhone 7 Plus without any issues. My photos and old Apps transferred without any issues. It only required a few setting tweaks. The seller shipped it out much faster than I expected. I had it in 4 days with no premium shipping charges.
customer_reviews.author: George R

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and nice price for iPhone 7S Plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and they promptly arrived. One had 78% battery capabicity so replaced that one after a few weeks of charging twice a day. Other than that, the phones were both in good shape and working well after 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: JoeB

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller..
customer_reviews.text: The phone went belly up after 4 months which is one month after their 90-day return policy. The phone must have a hardware failure as the camera, phone call, and wifi feature stopped working altogether. The seller advised to return the phone but I would have to bear all costs, i.e., shipping, repair, etc. and no guarantee on its repair. Bad rep for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: elee

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic issues - scratches & dings along edges/corners
customer_reviews.text: Estimated shipping was accurate. I have only had the black iPhone 7+, 128GB for approximately 12 hours & so far so good. Camera, microphone, battery, touch, etc. works well from my findings. You can most definitely see right off the bat that it’s used/refurbished due to very heavy nicks/dings around the edges of the phone. I still gave 4 stars because other than *minor* scuffs (considered cosmetic) everything else seems to be functioning to expectations. I will try to post pics but no promises.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Woods

customer_reviews.title: They ship with audio ic disease, when it is the most known issue with these models
customer_reviews.text: When you expect to get a refurbished product, you only get a body cleaned phone. This iPhone 7 plus came with the audio ic disease. I can’t even have phone calls and I’m wondering what was refurbished though? and by the way the screen is 👎🏻 Noticeably low quality. Please don’t buy refurbished because you won’t get what you pay for unless it’s less than 50% of the market value.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Hassan Ali

customer_reviews.title: It didn't said it was used..
customer_reviews.text: I was happy when my phone came and iy came so early from the day it was plan to be delivered but when i opened and i saw the phine has some scratches but i didn't want to return it because i really need the phone my was already broke... but i like it...
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Licea

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying it and second time being lucky
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 7+ came few days early and it works great so far. Battery was on 92% capacity which is pretty decent and it had screen protector on it! There are 2 minor scratches on the lower back on the phone which will be covered by any case regardless. I'll never buy a new phone from the store again!
customer_reviews.author: __island.kiddo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in quoted time. The phone is flawless and truly fully unlocked. It came in a generic box with just the plug (don’t expect the Apple box with leaflets) - couldn’t have asked for more. Just what I needed. I would use this route again in near future!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Phones sold here are NOT unlocked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Phones sold here are NOT unlocked!!! Be aware before you order it may it may not work with your carrier !!! In my case I have a Sprint line and the phone I received was with another carrier . I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure to buy an used iphone, but now I can say that it was a good buy. It really loos and works like new. They even put a good screen protector. I recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Quijano

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it I was wondering why did I get a brand new phone. It was as described maybe even better. I was a bit unsure as most of the reviews were negative but I'm very happy. It looked brand new. I would 100% recommend. I would be perfect if it had come in an Apple box but atleast I got a good phone. Click buy u won't regret
customer_reviews.author: Pinki

customer_reviews.title: Terrible condition 😔
customer_reviews.text: This phone wasn’t in great shape when it arrived however I didn’t want to mess around with returning it so I kept it but I wouldn’t recommend anyone to buy from this seller. I purchased 2 iPhone 7 Plus from different place and the other was in great she this one wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G.

customer_reviews.title: Non functioning not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience with the phone I received. A side from the physical and visible damage, the phone would also freeze randomly and stay stuck on certain applications. The texting would also mess up very frequently, I would be texting and the delete (backspace) key would not work or cause the phone to go into another frozen state for about 45 to 60 seconds at a time. I also compared the phone to another iPhone 7 Plus and the screen has like a light blue tint. Ultimately I took it to the Apple store and traded it in as credit towards an iPhone XR. Do not get suckered into this.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great customer support. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. One of them has a problem with the touchscreen. I returned the defective one and had a new one quick. The replacement works great. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is bad, guys don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: i got this phone a few days ago, at the first moment i was so glad because this phone was in a good shape. Then after a few days using it, i relized i had some issues with the battery life, i did ‘t touch it from 6 am to 12pm, and it droped from 100% to 38%, after full charged, the battery doesn’t last long enough for me to use in 2 hours. Really bad, i’m really dissapoited. Never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Phat Dang

customer_reviews.title: Not Verizon Compatible
customer_reviews.text: The phone it self was in great condition. First phone wasn't compatible with Verizon, Buy SPRY said sent it back we will send a replacement. Replacement was not compatible. Disappointing waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works brand new
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, easy to use with my cricket sim card. Good value and long battery life. Very large in size however
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get the phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone! As described. I’ve had no issues at all and I’ve had it for about 6 months or more now. So glad I just gave in and bought it after trying to decide for months If it was worth it! I was super worried because of reviews but the phone is great! No problems 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: It was great the moment I opened it, it was in gret condition (physically) after using it for a couple of day I noticed that the battery would go from 80% charge to 10% in 20 mins. The Screen would freeze and not respond to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Phone was not in good condition whatsoever.
customer_reviews.text: Was an absolutely horrible phone. Charging cord port didn't work, the device was too slow to function and reset itself if it had too many apps open. Promised to have a battery with at least 80% life on it, it only had 75% (maybe could last 45 minutes). Phone would overheat when powered on. Do not buy from them if these are the devices that are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Refurbished Phone, Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this not sure why so many bad reviews on this. My son is 14 I ordered for his Birthday 🎂 . He loves this phone my oldest daughter set it up for him. I'm very pleased . He plays fortnite on his and says the graphics are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Great product, like new!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Works like new and exactly as described! Comes with new charger and cord in a box that is not original Apple box but is fine.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: just like new!
customer_reviews.text: did not want to spend that much money on a new iPhone because I don't use my portable phone that much so this is a great value! received it 1 week after the order was placed by Fedex.
customer_reviews.author: g51

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a phone for my mom for Mother's Day. Seller shipped an inadequate charger with the phone (not enough volts to charge the phone- in addition to over heating the battery). Battery soon starting sending error messages. Had to replace battery at a local phone store. Local representative advised me that the battery was on the verge of exploding in the phone!!!! DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT POORLY "REFURBISHED" HARZARDOUS ELECTRONIC DEVICES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Love my iPhone 7 Plus 128 gb fully unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this refurbished iPhone 7 Plus 128 gb fully unlocked. I did so because the one I had previously owned was my favorite phone out of all the ones I’ve owned. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Seller has Claims that product has minor cosmetic flaws. And battery has greater than 80% battery. These are very false claims. Battery came with 78% capacity and Service message, also came with cracked rear camera glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price! My T-Mobile sim worked great. I inserted it and installed from iCloud. I did not need to call for assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Myles

customer_reviews.title: All was good except defective microphone
customer_reviews.text: Everything worked fine until I noticed nobody could hear me when talking on the phone. Microphone apparently defective. But seller was very good about prompt refund. Seller was trustworthy and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The phone isn’t unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Phone works perfectly no scratches no dents but the phone isn’t unlocked as stated 😒
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Jet Black is literally The Batphone. Sexy. No case for me thanks. At my budget and couldn’t be happier. The first thing I did was run it under water. The best feature and the speakers are loud!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used (Renewed) from Amazon from Kiss Electronics. It was like brand new. Everything worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G

customer_reviews.title: Like new
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. So far he likes it. He's coming from a Android so he had to get used to it. But works perfectly. No scratches, looks new.
customer_reviews.author: LauraAndablo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptical buyer and asking myself to go for it or not? I decided to and I’m happy I did so, the phone was in new condition, no scratches or anything, everything was functional . I’ve been using it for a week now and I haven’t had any problems with it. I love my iPhone !😃
customer_reviews.author: nandi munyulwa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I have it for almost 1year and never a si for issue.. perfect condition like new.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: haidy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what to refurbish means in this case the battery life sucks and this speaker does not work nor does the microphone from a distance you have to plug it in headphones for you to use it properly I am super disappointed that someone even try to sell that device for this much money on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Hisham Shalhoub

customer_reviews.title: Can't really give an honest review.....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone without reading the fine print.... Didn't work for me, but return was easy
customer_reviews.author: Fletch

customer_reviews.title: good but still looks used
customer_reviews.text: it works perfectly but still has some use marks on the back part... I know it is not a new phone, but still aspected less scratches
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Briceño

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone with a message saying the battery life was at 75% damage, the phone will not charge above 50%..
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My last phone (iPhone 6 plus) finally died and this was a great replacement and upgrade for a reasonable price. There were little blemishes on the outside just as was stated in the phone description, none major, and after a little while I didn’t mind them. It was also appreciated that my phone came with a tempered glass screen protector already installed.
customer_reviews.author: Nashel Tena

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I had a 5S for several years and was having all kinds of problems with it. My new 7 Plus has been working great! It's larger than I realized, and even friends who have the 10 or 11 think mine is large - but I think part of it is the case I'm using. I'm still happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Puder

customer_reviews.title: Nice but wrong
customer_reviews.text: Liked the phone but my service plan would not accept the phone so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: harold gordon

customer_reviews.title: Everything works satisfactorily!
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while the fingerprint reader is a little slow, but I've had that with other iPhones as well, so I don't think it's anything specific to this iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived on a non protected box, and the phone was not un good condition as the description says, The screen has a Lot le scratches and also dead pixels The body of the phone is very damaged it seems that has a Lot of falls before. Do not buy this phones
customer_reviews.author: patyfu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like a brand new model. What a great deal?
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK & SHEENA HANLAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone!
customer_reviews.text: Works better, than, I had taught! Would, absolutely, buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SHARON HARVEY

customer_reviews.title: it completely glitched after a few months! not useable at all!!
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly dissatisfied. I bought this phone and after a few months it has suddenly glitched with the screen pixilating and no functions at all. I am very unhappy with this wasted purchase. I do not have an apple store in my area and feel like amazon should stand behind this product for longer than 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great IPhone
customer_reviews.text: I like the IPhone 7 the only it didn’t come Headphone or lighting to 3:5 mm headphone Jack adapter.For the most part the iPhone came fast no delays.The phone look great no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Look good as new and is fully unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Yes it did meet my expectation it’s great look good as new only one problem I got was that the battery die a little too quick but it’s quickly change rge with the charger I got with it so I don’t really make it much of a big deal if you thinking about getting one you should
customer_reviews.author: Ronalds Donalds

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, easy setup. Battery only shows 85%. However 😒
customer_reviews.author: clark

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: You can turn your volume up all the way on the front of the phone and also into settings and you still sound like you’re about a three or four blocks away I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bennie

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere...
customer_reviews.text: 50% battery life. It took four hours to get a full charge and less than 45 minutes to lose its charge entirely. And I ended up stiffed with the return shipping fees. The 3rd party seller blames everything on software. Awful experience.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like
customer_reviews.text: There is many scratch in front battry is also not good
customer_reviews.author: Narayan Kumar Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Im very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected, which was awesome because it ended up coming on my birthday! Looks like a brand new phone. One very, very little barely noticeable scratch on the back but that’s all I've seen and my case covers it. Was very worried to get this phone, but so far I'm very satisfied. 87% battery maximum capacity too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is bad
customer_reviews.text: After taking the time to set my sons phone up after receiving for Christmas he tried playing music and the speaker has a hiss to it. Peaker is bad. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: SIM card reader did not function
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated this refurbished IPhone. When I received it, the SIM card reader initially worked and then failed the second day. I went to my cellular vendor and obtained a new SIM card and the IPhone 7 Plus still not read the updated card. Am sure this was just a fluke. I have returned the device after approval from seller and continue to wait for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ann loth

customer_reviews.title: Item is not as represented
customer_reviews.text: The phone is obviously water damaged. Speaker is Not working correctly, battery randomly shuts off When showing full, static and distortion when talking on phone, does not ring, volume goes up and down randomly, touch screen works sometimes not. Piece of crap. Don’t waste your money with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: traci rury

customer_reviews.title: Is like a brand new phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is working perfectly well. I have not had cause to regret buying it one day.
customer_reviews.author: Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great Refurbish
customer_reviews.text: SO far so good no defects either and the fingerprint reader works well aswell
customer_reviews.author: Islas

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a small scratch on the back, doesn’t affect the phone so I’m okay with it. Then noticed the speaker sounds muzzled and sometimes staticky. If it gets worse I will return.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Rabago

customer_reviews.title: The iphone was really like new.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks. Th gadget was really like new. And it’s works without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: The phone was a great deal and everything was working. I did not like the color but the phone does withit need to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Not look like new as what you said has a lot of marks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone Works well just not with my provider
customer_reviews.text: It just didn’t work with Xfinity mobile so I do have to return this item unlocked does not mean fully unlocked apparently I still haven’t figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Dick johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The phone came in better condition than expected. Virtually brand new condition. Battery life could be better...seems to be about 60-70% of what I read about the phone on Apple web sites prior to my purchase. Overall I give it a thumbs up and would recommend this seller to a would be buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone and for the first week it worked good. The second week after receiving it the screen was static and it continuously re-booted. I have send back the phone and requested a refund. I am still waiting for my refund
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte L. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: iphone 7 plus black
customer_reviews.text: It says it is renewed and looks like a new apple iphone. Also that it is checked up by amazon professionals. It came and the back of the phone was cracked and the camera was shattered. Second time in 1 week trying to buy an iphone off amazon. Neither of them worked :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Phone seems great. A few nicks on the sides but that’s expected. An added bonus was the 3 free months of phone service that was included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.ball

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Apple new
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen less sensitive and locks up a lot, don’t think I’ll waste time with refurbished Apple products again
customer_reviews.author: robin jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Gray deal
customer_reviews.text: Item like new, few minor scratches but does not affect usability
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The camera shutter will not be quite even if you have the iPhone on silent !
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone ! Arrived safely! Got the right color and the right storage space! Overall very happy with this iPhone ! Disappointed I can turn the camera shutter sound off. This phone came from Japan. So I am guessing that is why it won't let me turn the camera shutter off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but !
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter and she loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 plus is not worth the $ or hassle!
customer_reviews.text: Do no not buy this iPhone 7 plus automatically its disabled spent all money and can't even access the phone cuz its disabled. Unbelievable I bought 2 Galaxy note 9 and no problems at all 1 2 3 were up and running, iPhone 7 plus still disabled lol not kool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is not unlocked. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Not good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality of phone I can barely hear people and they can barely hear me totally unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: John tuetken

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even work don’t waste your money on it.The screen freezes and when it unfreezes it takes you to somewhere else.Its frustrating using this phone and Also for typing as well takes like 5 minutes to type 2 sentences.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone it works great it came real fast and it was in perfect condition. I was so scared to get it because I thought it was not gonna work and it would not let me cancel it but that was the only problem but it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader could be better. It does work but marginally. Battery charges up to 100%. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of scratch on the back of phone
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of white spot/scratch on the back description claims it's a like new no known Mark scratches. Which isn't true for the. Price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sumerall

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Liked text and voice command as my husband is visually impaired and he can do texts more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's saying Unlocked but it's locked phone.
customer_reviews.text: 1st. On Advertising it's saying Unlocked but I received locked phone. 2nd. The phone has big dent on top corner. I wasn't happy with this experience. Not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evank

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and I was really excited for it to come. It showed that it got delivered a day earlier on my phone but when I went home, it was not there. It also said I signed my name for it but I did not. If I could rate 0 stars, I would. Do not buy this product. This is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Condition!
customer_reviews.text: I always get nervous about purchasing a product when I see bad reviews but I was happy to open my package to my new iPhone 7 Plus in perfect condition! There we no scratches, cracks or anything wrong when using the phone. Very happy about my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Marquis Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The phone arrived faulty.
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived broken. Not the screen but the charging port. Meaning this was damaged BEFORE shipping. Meaning they didn't check the phone before sending it. Currently trying to get a refund, but even that is proving difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Good condition just had to get a new battery
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in good condition just had to get a new battery
customer_reviews.author: Victor Green

customer_reviews.title: Good price but not happy about two things
customer_reviews.text: There is NOT 3d touch and the camera shutter sound and the recording sound is not able to be turned off. It is a good phone and nothing else is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: cow

customer_reviews.title: iPhone 7 Plus 128gb
customer_reviews.text: Overall good phone, battery life good for what it is only problem is half an inch of the left side screen doesn’t work half the time and it’s really annoying
customer_reviews.author: Jose Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer..
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter and she's happy and satisfied.. No complain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, not so nice charger.
customer_reviews.text: Product was nice. Charger died/malfunctioned and would no longer charge phone so I ended up having to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: FaLinda Johnson

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 7 Plus, 128GB, Black - For AT&T / T-Mobile (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Size:128GB| Color:BlackiPhone 7 Plus dramatically improves the most important aspects of the iPhone experience. It introduces advanced new camera systems. The best performance and battery life ever in an iPhone. Immersive stereo speakers. The brightest, most colorful iPhone display. Splash and water resistance. And it looks every bit as powerful as it is. This is iPhone 7 Plus. iPhone 7 Plus reaches a new level of innovation and precision. The enclosure is splash and water resistant. The Home button is completely reengineered. And with a new unibody design that's seamless to the touch, iPhone 7 Plus feels as amazing as it looks. With its entire enclosure reengineered, iPhone 7 Plus is the very first water resistant iPhone. So now you're protected like never before against spills, splashes, and even dust. The Home button on iPhone 7 Plus is an advanced solid-state button designed to be durable, responsive, and pressure sensitive. Working in tandem with the new Taptic Engine, it gives you precise tactile feedback as you press. And it's even customizable. Welcome home. iPhone is the most popular camera in the world. Now we've reengineered that beloved camera, adding optical image stabilization, an ƒ/1.8 aperture, and a six-element lens to make it even better for shooting photos and videos in low light. And with advanced new features like wide color capture, your photos and Live Photos will look even more vibrant.
feature_bullets: Locked to the GSM network and only compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T, T-Mobile and Metro. Will not work with Sprint, Verizon, US Cellular or Cricket.
The device does not come with headphones or a SIM card. It does include a charger and charging cable that may be generic, in which case it will be UL or Mfi (Made for iPhone) Certified.
Inspected and guaranteed to have minimal cosmetic damage, which is not noticeable when the device is held at arms length.
Successfully passed a full diagnostic test which ensures like-new functionality and removal of any prior-user personal information.
Tested for battery health and guaranteed to have a minimum battery capacity of 80%.
